doc:
Phil Harris https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phil_Harris 0 Wonga Philip Harris (June 24, 1904 – August 11, 1995) was an American comedian, actor, singer, and jazz musician. He was an orchestra leader and a pioneer in radio situation comedy, first with Jack Benny, then in a series in which he co-starred with his wife, singer-actress Alice Faye, for eight years. Harris is also noted for his voice acting in animated films. He played Baloo the bear in The Jungle Book (1967), Thomas O'Malley in The Aristocats (1970), and Little John in Robin Hood (1973). In 1981, he sang "Back Home Again in Indiana" before the Indianapolis 500. Wonga_Philip_Harris ( June_24_,_1904 – August_11_,_1995 ) was an_American_comedian , actor , singer , and jazz_musician . He was an_orchestra_leader and a_pioneer in radio_situation_comedy , first with Jack_Benny , then in a_series in which he co-starred with his_wife , singer-actress_Alice_Faye , for eight_years . Harris is_also_noted for his_voice acting in animated_films . He played Baloo_the_bear in The_Jungle_Book_(_1967_) , Thomas_O'Malley in The_Aristocats_(_1970_) , and Little_John in Robin_Hood_(_1973_) . In 1981 , he sang " Back_Home_Again in Indiana " before the_Indianapolis_500 .
